verbs.description: mineralize (third-person singular simple present mineralizes, present participle mineralizing, simple past and past participle mineralized)

entries.meaning: To convert to a mineral; to petrify.
examples: in all these cases , the bones found in caverns are never mineralised, but simply in the state of grave bones more or less decayed or incrusted by stalagmite ; and have no farther connexion with the rocks themselves

entries.meaning: To mineralogize; to collect and study minerals.
